TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPartitionResolver

summary.span: 定義必須為自訂工作階段狀態分割解析實作的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that must be implemented for custom session-state partition resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作介面和和方法，如果您提供的自訂分割解析工作階段狀態資料到多個後端節點時以 SQL 或狀態伺服器模式。Implement the interface and the and methods, if you are providing custom partition resolution for session-state data across multiple backend nodes when in SQL or state-server mode. 可在設定的工作階段狀態管理資訊[工作階段狀態項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)具有組態檔的`partitionResolverType`屬性。The session-state management information can be configured in the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) of the configuration file with the `partitionResolverType` attribute. 如果指定的值`partitionResolverType`屬性`sqlConnectionString`和`stateConnectionString`屬性會被忽略。If a value is specified for the `partitionResolverType` attribute, the `sqlConnectionString` and `stateConnectionString` attributes are ignored. 磁碟分割解析度設定也可以設定以程式設計方式使用屬性。The partition resolution configuration can also be set programmatically using the property. 如果指定屬性，和屬性會被忽略。If the property is specified, the and properties are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化自訂分割解析程式 (Resolver)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以提供您的自訂磁碟分割解析為所需的初始化程式碼。Use the method to provide any initialization code that is needed for your custom partition resolution. 建立型別實作介面，呼叫方法來初始化 （每個執行個體），則表示 ASP.NET 狀態服務或資料分割正在使用並傳遞 SQL Server 提供者提供者的解析程式執行個體。The creates the type implementing the interface, calls the method to initialize it (once per instance), and then indicates to the ASP.NET state service or SQL Server provider that partitioning is being used and passes a resolver instance to the provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ResolvePartition(object key) cil managed
Public Function ResolvePartition (key As Object) As String

param.name: key
param.span: 識別項，用於判斷目前工作階段狀態要使用的分割。

span.span: An identifier used to determine which partition to use for the current session state.

summary.span: 根據索引鍵參數解析分割。

span.span: Resolves the partition based on a key parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `key`參數方法屬性。The `key` parameter of the method is the property. 屬性可唯一識別瀏覽器與伺服器上的工作階段資料。The property uniquely identifies a browser with session data on the server.
